Not Found

HTTP Error 404. The requested resource is not found.

data:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found
Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii
Date: Sat, 09 Mar 2019 05:20:00 GMT
Connection: close
Content-Length: 315

CVE-2010-1256.summary: Unspecified vulnerability in Microsoft IIS 6.0, 7.0, and 7.5, when Extended Protection for Authentication is enabled, allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors related to "token checking" that trigger memory corruption, aka "IIS Authentication Memory Corruption Vulnerability."

CVE-2010-2730.summary: Buffer overflow in Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 7.5, when FastCGI is enabled, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted headers in a request, aka "Request Header Buffer Overflow Vulnerability."

CVE-2010-3972.summary: Heap-based buffer overflow in the TELNET_STREAM_CONTEXT::OnSendData function in ftpsvc.dll in Microsoft FTP Service 7.0 and 7.5 for Internet Information Services (IIS) 7.0, and IIS 7.5, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (daemon crash) via a crafted FTP command, aka "IIS FTP Service Heap Buffer Overrun Vulnerability." NOTE: some of these details are obtained from third party information.

CVE-2010-1899.summary: Stack consumption vulnerability in the ASP implementation in Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 5.1, 6.0, 7.0, and 7.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (daemon outage) via a crafted request, related to asp.dll, aka "IIS Repeated Parameter Request Denial of Service Vulnerability."

CVE-2012-2531.summary: Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 7.5 uses weak permissions for the Operational log, which allows local users to discover credentials by reading this file, aka "Password Disclosure Vulnerability."

Isle of Wight Council

2019-03-11T11:36:04+0000

With strong winds predicted for tonight, please could residents help us to prevent wind blowing recycling everywhere overnight on tue/wed by setting out your recycling/ waste as close to 7am on the morning of your collection. Any excess card/paper or recycling should be weighted down, if at all possible.

Isle of Wight Council

2019-03-10T20:00:00+0000

Have your say on the West Wight School Place Planning survey - it closes on 15 April - via the survey link: https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/WestWightSchools2019 Come along to the public meeting/ drop in sessions: - Wednesday 13 March 2019 at All Saints' CE Primary School between 6pm and 8pm - Monday 1 April 2019 at St Saviour's Catholic Primary School between 6pm and 8pm . Further info is at : https://www.iow.gov.uk/Residents/Schools-and-Learning/Schools/School-Consultation Comments can also be made via the following email address: SandLBusinessSupport@IOW.gov.uk

Isle of Wight Council

2019-03-10T19:00:00+0000

Don’t let the grass grow under your feet, it’s time to re-new your garden waste subscription. Visit www.iwight.com/GreenGardenWaste

Isle of Wight Council

2019-03-08T17:05:52+0000

Isle of Wight Council supports and celebrates apprentices The Isle of Wight Council has been celebrating its burgeoning apprenticeship programme. At its recent staff awards an apprentice of the year category was created – with Danielle Harris from Legal Services, the first recipient. • Danielle Harris from Legal Services receives her award from director of corporate services, Claire Shand. https://www.iow.gov.uk/news/Celebrateing-apprentices

Isle of Wight Council

2019-03-08T15:41:36+0000

Our team have been celebrating International Women’s Day today with a workshop to help improve self esteem at Newport Family Centre, run by a family intervention mental health nurse. Some of the themes discussed included: "powerful", "strong", "determined" and "brave". #IWD2019 #BalanceForBetter.

All News

Register for 'The Island' e-newsletter

Sign up to receive our new community e-newsletter get the latest features and news from the council - direct to your inbox

Celebrating apprentices

The Isle of Wight Council has been celebrating its burgeoning apprenticeship programme.

Sign up for Council Tax eBilling

Sign up online to receive your Council Tax bill by email.

The big commuter survey

The Isle of Wight Council is conducting a commuter survey that could have a positive effect on the lives of residents.

Support for mental health and wellbeing

Register for free on SilverCloud, get online support to help you to manage your mental health and wellbeing.

Island selected for pilot project

The Isle of Wight has been chosen to run a pilot project to improve support for residents with communication needs.

Isle of Wight Local Offer

All families need extra support from time to time. Knowing what is available gives you more choice to get the right support.

Freedom of the Isle of Wight

A doctor who played a leading role at Mountbatten Hospice is being recommended to receive the Freedom of the Isle of Wight.
